title: Kurumba Reprise Lyrics Tik Tik Tik
stanzas:
valigal migizhnthen unnaal
palanaal siriththaen unnaal
sila naal azhuthaen unnaale

enai naan unarndhaen unnaal
edaiyum kuraindhaen unnaal
varangal nirandhaen unnaale

kovam vandhaal
ennai adippaai
naan irugiduven
kattikondu muththam
koduppaai naan urugiduven
urugiduven

Kurumba ..
en ulagam neethaandaa
kurumba ...
en vidiyal neethaandaa (2)

pallikkul ne pugumpotho
vetridam aagum nenjam
un palli vidumurai endraal
anjum.

saapida kooppidathaane
eththanai kodi lanjam
aanaalum thattil paadhi
enjum.

endhan aadai ellaame
kasangi kizhiyum unnaal
en kannam rendodu
muththa thazhumbum unnaal.

undhan kurumbu marabanu
evvazhi kondaai
enakku theriyaathaaa

Kurumba ..
en ulagam neethaandaa
kurumba ...
en vidiyal neethaandaa (2)

kuliyal araiyil oru por
cartoon niruththa oru por
dhinamum porgal nammullae

panikkul pagira oru por
iravil uranga oru por
azhagaai porgal
nammullae..

vinnaivittu ennil vandhaai
en ulam kulira
annai endru pattam
thanthaaye naan
thalai nimira.
thalai nimira

Kurumba ..
en ulagam neethaandaa
kurumba ...
en vidiyal neethaandaa

kurumba
en udhiram neethaandaa
kurumbaa
en uyiraeÂ  neethaandaa

seo.title: Kurumba Reprise Lyrics Tik Tik Tik
seo.description: Get the complete Kurumba Reprise Lyrics Tik Tik Tik from Tik Tik Tik. Read the lyrics penned by Karky and composed by D Imman and sung by Mirthula Siva. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Karky, Tik Tik Tik, D Imman, Mirthula Siva, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
